url.fieldDescription: Enter the URL to share. You can use an anchor at the end if you like, e.g. http://girlscouts.org#news. If left blank, the current page will be used
url.name: ./url

title.fieldDescription: Enter the title of the post to share. Note: This will only appear for certain social networks, like Facebook and Pinterest. If blank, social network may generate a title based on page content or metadata.
title.name: ./title

facebook.fieldDescription: Check to show Facebook Share Button
facebook.name: ./facebook

pinterest.fieldDescription: Check to show Pinterest Share Button
pinterest.name: ./pinterest

twitter-message.fieldDescription: Enter the message to Tweet (max 140 characters). If blank, Twitter may pull data from page or page metadata
twitter-message.maxLengthText: Message can not be longer than 140 characters
twitter-message.name: ./twitterMessage

other-message.fieldDescription: Enter a message for other social media. You can make this message longer, but it may be cut off depending on the social network's requirements
other-message.name: ./otherMessage
